page.title: 01GAZETTEER.
page.content: The area is basically rural,consisting mainly of farmland or woodland. A large proportion of the land belongs to the{Chatsworth Estate of the Duke of Devonshire. Parts of three settlements are included in the area, namely{Whaley, {Upper Langwith}and{Hillstown. The main industry of the area tends to be{farming}or services associated with{agriculture}but there is also a{limestone quarry}near Whaley. The nature of the area is slowly changing as a number of farms have been split up and sold. The newest develpoment in the area is the building of a{community {hospital}which began in 1985.
